data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to a faithful non-believer today, someone like Cornelius, and then Father please connect him with the church in Chüy, Kyrgyzstan.
data.verse: Cornelius answered: “Three days ago I was in my house praying at this hour, at three in the afternoon. Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor."

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Chüy, Kyrgyzstan
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, please, raise up a generation of disciples in the state of Chüy who will make disciples who make disciples.
Lord, give grace to the local leaders who shepherd the 2,391 believers in the state of Chüy.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd. The good shepherd lays down his life for the sheep.

data.prayer: Lord, the the state of Chüy will disappear one day, but your Word will never disappear. Call all who claim Christianity to anchor their lives on your Word.
data.verse: Heaven and earth will disappear, but my words will never disappear.

data.prayer: Lord, please remember the Chechen people. you said you wanted worshippers of every tongue and tribe and nation, yet we know of no worshippers among them.
Spirit, sanctify the 2,391 believers in Chüy and keep them blameless until Jesus returns.
data.verse: May the God of peace himself sanctify you completely. May your whole spirit, soul, and body be preserved blameless at the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ. He who calls you is faithful, who will also do it.

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the state of Chüy to agree with you and with one another in love.
data.verse: that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.section_summary:
the state of Chüy, Kyrgyzstan has a population of 790,400.

We estimate Chüy has 2,391 people who might know Jesus, 26,917 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 761,092 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 330 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, we pray that the people of Chüy, Kyrgyzstan will learn to study the Bible, understand it, obey it, and share it.
